original_text: And Moses returned unto the Lord, and said, Lord, wherefore hast thou so evil entreated this people? why is it that thou hast sent me?
korean_text: 모세가 여호와께 돌아와서 아뢰되 주여 어찌하여 이 백성이 학대를 당하게 하셨나이까 어찌하여 나를 보내셨나이까

sentences.original_text: And Moses returned unto the Lord
wherefore hast thou so evil entreated this people?
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 이 백성을 이렇게 악하게 대하셨나이까?

sentences.original_text: why is it that thou hast sent me?
